steps.step: step toward 12:00 into a forward bow while executing a double horizontal finger thrust to your opponent's eyes.
pivot into a neutral bow as you execute a left crane hook grab to your opponent's right wrist, pulling his hand to your left hip. Simultaneously execute a upward elbow to your opponent's chin.
Settle into your neutral bow as you execute a overhead palm heel claw to your opponent's face. Simultaneously execute a thrusting palm heel to your opponent's solar plexus.
